review: I love the Fire Stick and how it works. The set up was easy with the helpful tutorial. I do wish the list of the videos available on amazon prime was more extensive with more of the old classics. I am using the Firestick to explore what is available on Netflix using their 30-day trial account. You will like the device and depending on your taste you may like the available content more than I do. If you you didn't buy a smart TV and you want access to video streaming on that TV this is what you need. Just plug ... play...and watch.
author: Andrew C. Dalzell
